Text:
Nice little platformer. Woks very well. 
Thx uploader.

I seem to have a problem with the config_tool.. Several of the buttons are completely blank and the "sc_resolution" options are all NONE. I tried to configure the gamepad, but nothing registers. (game works fine btw) Any help would be appreciated..
To my previous comment, I have everything updated (.net framework and directx). All I want to do is change the controls so I can play with my gamepad. Sorry for double post.
